Constructor Detail

Fish

public Fish(double x,
            double y,
            double vx,
            double vy)
Creates a new Fish.

Parameters:
x - the initial x coordinate
y - the initial y coordinate
vx - horizontal component of the velocity of the fish
vy - vertical component of the velocity of the fish
Method Detail

headingRight

public boolean headingRight()
Tells whether this fish heading right (from left to right on the game scene).

Returns:
true if this fish heading right; false otherwise (if heading to left)
